title: Write TUI documentation and user guide
description: Create TUI user guide. Document keyboard shortcuts, features, configuration options. Add screenshots/screencasts, troubleshooting section, API docs for library usage (Gira integration).

comments.author: jared@goatbytes.io
comments.content:
TUI documentation is comprehensive and complete:

✅ Documentation Created:
- Main TUI guide (251 lines) - Overview, quick tour, getting started
- Keyboard shortcuts reference (320 lines) - Complete shortcut documentation
- Features guide (538 lines) - In-depth feature documentation
- Configuration guide (745 lines) - All TUI config options documented
- Interface guide (509 lines) - Detailed UI component reference
- Modals guide (688 lines) - Settings, tools, model selection
- Themes guide (346 lines) - Theme gallery and customization

Total: 3,146 lines of comprehensive TUI documentation

✅ Visual Assets:
- Screenshots of all major UI components
- Animated GIF demo (consoul-themes.gif)
- Modal screenshots (settings, tools, attachments, model picker, etc.)
- Theme screenshots (dark, light, nord, gruvbox, tokyo-night, flexoki, etc.)

✅ Content Coverage:
- Interface components (header, sidebar, chat area, input, footer)
- Message types (user, assistant, system, tool calls)
- Conversation management features
- Real-time streaming
- File attachments
- Tool execution and approval workflow
- Theme customization
- Settings and configuration
- Keyboard shortcuts (global, modal-specific, input)
- Troubleshooting section
- Tips & tricks
- Workflow examples (code review, debugging, learning, research)

Documentation location: docs/user-guide/tui/
